description: This file defines the StorageProvider interface, which abstracts file storage operations such as saving, opening, checking existence, and deleting files. Implementations may handle local or cloud storage solutions.

classes.name: StorageProvider
classes.description: Interface outlining methods for file storage operations, including saving, opening, checking existence, and deletion of files.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a file stream to storage under a logical path and returns a URL or path. May throw StorageProviderException.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Retrieves an InputStream for a stored object. May throw StorageProviderException.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Checks whether a file exists at the specified logical path.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the object at the specified logical path, returns true if successful or if the object does not exist.
